meanings.definition: To be of use or advantage
meanings.sent1: She found availing the umbrella during the rainstorm very helpful.
meanings.sent2: Availing the opportunity to learn new skills can lead to personal growth.
meanings.sent3: Availing her knowledge of gardening, she helped her neighbor plant flowers.
meanings.sent4: Like a key unlocking a door, availing the right resources can open up new possibilities.
meanings.sent5: Availing the map, he navigated through the forest with ease.

meanings.definition: To be of help or benefit
meanings.sent1: Availing his expertise in carpentry, he fixed the broken chair.
meanings.sent2: The extra study sessions were availing the students in preparing for the exam.
meanings.sent3: Availing her advice, he avoided making a costly mistake.
meanings.sent4: In times of need, availing the support of friends can bring comfort.
meanings.sent5: Availing the warm blanket, she cozied up on the couch.

meanings.definition: To use or employ for a specific purpose
meanings.sent1: Availing the latest technology, the company improved its efficiency.
meanings.sent2: He was availing his artistic skills to create a beautiful mural.
meanings.sent3: Availing the ingredients in the kitchen, she whipped up a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: Just like a painter availing different colors, she mixed various flavors in her dish.
meanings.sent5: Availing the tools in the shed, he started working on his woodworking project.
